mapper.select: SELECT C.COUPON_ID, C.COUPON_TITLE, C.COUPON_AVAILABLE_TYPE, C.COUPON_CREATE_DATE, C.COUPON_EXPIRE_DATE, C.COUPON_DISCOUNT_RATE FROM TBL_COUPON C JOIN TBL_MEMBER_COUPON MC ON C.COUPON_ID = MC.COUPON_ID AND MC.COUPON_STATE = 'AVAILABLE' JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON MC.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID AND MC.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_RESERVATION(RESERVATION_ID, MEMBER_ID, LAWYER_ID, CONSULTING_TYPE, RESERVATION_CONTENT, MEMBER_FAKE_NAME, MEMBER_DESIRED_PHONE) VALUES(SEQ_RESERVATION.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{lawyerId}, #{consultingType}, #{reservationContent}, #{memberFakeName}, #{memberDesiredPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT P2.RESERVATION_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, P1.RESERVATION_ID FROM (SELECT RESERVATION_ID FROM TBL_RESERVATION WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY RESERVATION_ID DESC) P1 ) P2 WHERE P2.R = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PAYMENT(PAYMENT_ID, PAYMENT_LIST, RESERVATION_ID) VALUES(SEQ_PAYMENT.NEXTVAL, #{paymentList}, #{reservationId})
